backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with authorization, user profiles, products, orders, commissions, referral bonuses, payout requests, and related storage maps and counters.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for referral bonus updates and admin product designation, including affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for all frontend files, describing their roles in routing, UI, data fetching, and admin features.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS theme variables and dark mode styles for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router, authentication gating, root layout, profile setup modal, and all app routes.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryStat: Reusable loading, error, and empty state UI components.
frontend/src/components/formatters/money: Provides currency and date formatting utilities for bigint values.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Top-level layout including navigation, content wrapper, and footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Navigation bar with role-based links, mobile menu, user dropdown, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal form for creating a user profile with optional referral handling and calls to profile and referral mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, including login, logout, stored identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for profiles, referrals, roles, products, orders, and other backend interactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light/dark modes and global styling overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Simple page showing an access-denied message with navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCatalogPag: Admin interface for managing products, including listing, creating, editing, and assigning ID‑products, restricted to admin users.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPayoutsPag: Admin page that lists payout requests, lets admins approve or reject them, and displays pending and processed payouts.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogItemPage.tsx: Product detail page allowing authenticated users to view product info, set quantity, and place orders.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays products and services fetched from the backend, redirecting unauthenticated users and organizing items into product and service grids.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Loads and displays user profile, referrals, earnings, and orders, providing a business overview and referral link copying.
frontend/src/pages/EarningsPage.tsx: Shows earnings metrics and detailed commission and bonus histories with filter controls for levels.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkPage.tsx: Fetches and displays the user’s downline counts and member details across levels 1 and 2.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with a message and button to return home.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed order info including product details, status, pricing, and navigation back to the orders list.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Displays the user's order history with product info, status, and navigation to order details, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/PayoutsPage.tsx: Shows earnings, payout balance, and past payout requests while allowing users to submit new withdrawal requests.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view and edit their profile details such as name, email, and phone.
frontend/src/pages/ReferralsPage.tsx: Provides referral code/link sharing and displays a table of direct referrals with basic profile info.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Presents an Internet Identity sign‑in button and redirects logged‑in users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/utils/referrals.ts: Utility functions for building referral links, reading referral codes from the URL, and copying text to the clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL or hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the MLM app's goals, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features.
